title: #122: Michael Cohen, Stormy Daniels and New Legal Precedents
description:
Today Jim and Lisa interview powerhouse defense attorney and television commentator Sara Azari. Sara has some interesting insights into the legal precedents being set in recent current events. We talk about the raid on lawyer Michael Cohen's office and the implications of all kinds of legal issues going on in the current political climate. Laura is away in the U.K. continuing her fight for more stalker awareness.  

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
